title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Monday

Start your week right with deals on popular tech products. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Happy Monday! In my opinion, there's no better way to start the week than shopping a good deal. Not only do you get the excitement of getting something delivered, but you also save some cash. Between Gold Box deals and price tracking our favorite products, we managed to find some incredible deals on Amazon that are actually worth shopping. Today, you can save on robot vacuums, blenders, Halloween candy, and more.

1. $50 off: A blender from the makers of the Instant Pot

The Instant Pot does the pressure cooking, but this does the blending. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

Instant Pot is already known for the hottest pressure cooker on the market, but they also make a blender that can cook soup, whip up nut butters, and make almond milk—all for half the price of a Vitamix. When we tested them side-by-side, we found that the Instant Ace could produce similar quality nut milk and smoothies, though it took a little longer to achieve the results. If you want a blender that can make more than smoothies, now's your chance to snag one for just $10 more than its Prime Day price.

Get the Instant Ace Plus Cooking & Beverage Blender for $99.99 (Save $50)

2. Lowest price: One of our favorite car chargers for road trips

Keep you devices charged on the road at a great price. (Photo: Maxboost)

Trust me: You never want to go without a charger in your car. Whether you going on a 10-hour road trip or 30 minute commute, you going to want your phone to be juiced up. How else can you play music? After testing several car chargers, we found that this one from Maxboost was our runner-up because it charged phones the quickest (less than two hours) and has two ports for devices.Right now, it's back down to the lowest price we've ever seen.

Get the Maxboost 24W USB Car Charger for $7.99 (Save $2)

3. $54 off: Our favorite affordable robot vacuum

Get an inexpensive 'bot to do your dirty work. (Photo: Eufy)

We all hate vacuuming, so why do we still do it every single day? Instead, get a robot vacuum to do your least favorite chore. Plus, you don't even have to spend too much to get a great one. Right now, you can get our favorite affordable robot vacuum for its lowest price with the on-page coupon and code eufyrobovac, and the discount is already applied to the model in white. We already love the Eufy RoboVac 11S for its great cleaning power and reasonable price, so saving even more is a big bonus.

Get the Eufy RoboVac 11S for $185.99 (Save $54) with the on-page coupon and code eufyrobovac

4. Up to 25% off: Your favorite Halloween candy

Save big on your favorite candy—just in time for Halloween. (Photo: Reviewed)

Whether you're trick-or-treating, planning on handing out candy, or just love Halloween candy, this Deal of the Day is for you. Right now, you can save up to 25% on a variety of popular Halloween candy like Reese's, Hershey's Kisses, Twizzlers, and so many variety packs that are perfect for the ghosts and goblins knocking on your door. Personally, I'm excited about saving on the new Reese's Take5 Bar, which is a fusion of the two best candy bars in existence.

Get up to 25% on Hershey's Halloween candy

5. Lowest price: Silicone sheets for baking and roasting

These mats can help solve your baking woes, and they're at a great price. (Photo: Amazon)

One of my favorite cooking tools is a silicone baking mat. They create a nonstick surface for baking or roasting, so your cookies won't stick and use can use less oil while roasting veggies. Plus, it creates less waste than parchment paper and is still easy to clean. Right now, you can get a 2-pack of these popular ones from AmazonBasics for their lowest price ever.

Get the AmazonBasics Silicone Baking Mat Sheet, Set of 2 for $8.11 (Save $4.86)

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
